objects.description: [Valak](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0476) has downloaded a variety of modules and payloads to the compromised host, including [IcedID](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0483) and NetSupport Manager RAT-based malware.(Citation: Unit 42 Valak July 2020)(Citation: Cybereason Valak May 2020)

external_references.description: Duncan, B. (2020, July 24). Evolution of Valak, from Its Beginnings to Mass Distribution. Retrieved August 31, 2020.
Salem, E. et al. (2020, May 28). VALAK: MORE THAN MEETS THE EYE . Retrieved June 19, 2020.
